channel.title: Comparison
channel.description:
post two things (doesn't matter who or what) and others will quote and give their comparison of the two. EXAMPLE:
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nghUCS6zqIE&feature=relmfu]Mushroomhead[/url] Vs [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6fVE8kSM43I&feature=related]Slipknot[/url] My view on this comparison is that Mushroom-head is 100x better due to the fact that they have better singers than corey in slipknot
there are no limits to the amount of comparisons you want to give and there is no room for flamewars, you can argue with someone but please keep this on topic.
